review: I'm rating the Fire TV Stick 4 instead of 5 because so far I've been unable to use it on my main TV (which is a large Sony Bravia). My internet modem is upstairs in a bedroom and is apparently too far away for a strong connection downstairs where I'd like to use the Stick. It's working great on my smaller HDTV upstairs, in the same room as the internet modem. If anyone has suggestions for correcting this issue, please let me know. But keep in mind that I can't move the modem.

review: I have used Apple TV and a wired connection from my PC for years. But I wanted more content choices and easy portability. Worked great for a week. Now it refuses to recognize any passwords - ones that it has been using for a week. When I reenter it seems unable to connect.. And as to portability, when I moved it from one set to another it lost all the apps and password info, so that's not worth the hassle. Good idea. Good price. But the technical execution seems pretty shoddy to me. I'd wait 6 months until they put a usable product out.
